Description:
Detects the import of an alternate data stream with regini.exe, regini.exe can be used to modify registry keys.

Author: Eli Salem, Sander Wiebing, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Registry Modification From ADS Via Regini.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\regini.exe' and original_file_name = 'regini.exe') and command re ':[^ \\]')
